markdownRemark.excerpt: Is everyone up on ctrl+R in bash? It lets you do a reverse filter search through your bash history (kind of like history piped to grep but cooler). It’s really…
markdownRemark.html: Is everyone up on ctrl+R in bash? It lets you do a reverse filter search through your bash history (kind of like history piped to grep but cooler). It’s really handy, I’m guessing most everyone knows it already but just in case anybody missed it, you should definitely give it a try.

frontmatter.title: Quickly search through your Bash history
